cobblemon.move.asteroidshot.desc: The user calls Asteroids to rain from above. This may also leave the target with a burn.
cobblemon.move.brace.desc: The user readies itself making it immune to critical hits. Attack and Sp. Attack fall but Defense and Sp. Defense Rise.
cobblemon.move.causticbreath.desc: A blast of corrosive breath rolls over the foe. It may lower the target's defenses.
cobblemon.move.cheapshot.desc: The user distracts the foe, then targets its weak spot in a vicious attack. This attack always results in a critical hit.
cobblemon.move.frostslash.desc: The user slashes fiercely with sharpened ice. Critical hits land more easily.
cobblemon.move.jetstrike.desc: At a dizzying speed, the user lunges at the foe. This move is sure to strike first.
cobblemon.move.leafshield.desc: The user is cloaked in protective leaves which boost its Defenses. The boost is greater during intense sunlight.

cobblemon.move.shootingstar.desc: The user shoots star shaped rays that never miss at all foes in battle.
cobblemon.move.sluggishbrew.desc: The user brews a weird concoction that paralyzes the target.
cobblemon.move.squeezehug.desc: The user wraps their limbs around the target and squeezes them for four to five turns.
cobblemon.move.sunbath.desc: The user lays down and takes in the solar energy to heal its wounds, the user restores its own HP by half of its max HP.
cobblemon.move.tagout.desc: The user switches places with a party Pokémon in waiting and passes along any stat changes.
cobblemon.move.infobeam.desc: The User forcibly uploads information into the Target's head. This may also confuse the target.
cobblemon.move.spindash.desc: The User revvs up into a spiked ball, before bolting at the Target. This move always goes first.
cobblemon.move.groundpound.desc: The User jumps into the air right above their Target, before crashing down right on top of them. The more the user outweighs the target, the greater the move’s power.
cobblemon.move.firewall.desc: The User manifests an antiviral wall, protecting them from any move the Target throws at them next. Its chance of failing rises if it is used in succession.
cobblemon.move.planepound.desc: The User launches plastic toy planes at the Target two to five times in a row.
cobblemon.move.bricktrap.desc: The User uses their vast resources to encase the Target in a trap made of plastic bricks for four to five turns.
cobblemon.move.polymerpelt.desc: By utilising their Plasticity, the User flings a potent ball of polymers at the Target. This may also confuse the target.
cobblemon.move.compoundbrick.desc: The User throws a big brick of Plastic combined from other bricks of Plastic at the Target.
cobblemon.move.toycarcrash.desc: The User crashes into the Target with an array of toy cars.
cobblemon.move.blockblitz.desc: The User sends out a rapid onslaught of Plastic Bricks at their Target. This may also confuse the target.
cobblemon.move.plasticseal.desc: The User hurls and coats the Target in a synthetic polymer coating and changes the target’s type to Plstic.
cobblemon.move.polymercannon.desc: The User harnesses a great amount of their own Polymers to attack the Target. This also damages the user quite a lot.
cobblemon.move.buildup.desc: The User sporadically builds themselves up with plastic, sharply raising the Defense stat but sharply decreasing Evasion.
cobblemon.move.glitch.desc: The User runs up to the Target and flashes them with a vast assault of glitches. This may also lower all the target’s stats at once.
cobblemon.move.sssslash.desc: Hits twice. On the second turn, the user hits the target with a glitchy mess of code in the shape of a blade. Critical hits land more easily.
cobblemon.move.integeroverflow.desc: The user turns the target’s power against it. The higher the target’s Sp.A stat, the greater the damage it deals.
cobblemon.move.exploitsion.desc: The user attacks everything around it by causing a tremendous explosion. The user faints upon using this move.
cobblemon.move.simulateddread.desc: The User shows the Target a glimpse of their reality and their existence as a videogame character. The target faints instantly if this attack hits.
cobblemon.move.cyclonebeatdown.desc: The User creates strong winds around itself to jump high into the sky for the first turn before striking the target in the second, if the move misses the user takes recoil damage. The move may be Wind or Fighting type depending on which is more effective.
cobblemon.move.shatterfist.desc: The user hits the target with its brittle fists two to five times in a row. This also damages the user quite a lot.
cobblemon.move.undegradeable.desc: The user endures any attack with at least 1 HP. Its chance of failing rises if it is used in succession.
cobblemon.move.massproduction.desc: Raises the target's Attack and Sp.A by 2 stages and leaves the target badly poisoned.
cobblemon.move.plasticexplosive.desc: Two turns after this move is used, a chunk of plastic explodes on the target.
cobblemon.move.plasticrings.desc: The user traps the target in a series of six plastic rings for four to five turns.
cobblemon.move.clockworkmouse.desc: The user damages the target twice in succession by sending a toy mouse to hit the target.
cobblemon.move.plasticblade.desc: The user handles a plastic blade of some kind and attacks by cutting its target. Critical hits land more easily.
cobblemon.move.crystaldance.desc: The user vigorously performs a mystic, powerful dance that raises its Attack and Speed stats.
cobblemon.move.brickwall.desc: This move enables the user to protect itself from all attacks. Its chance of failing rises if it is used in succession.
cobblemon.move.foamdarts.desc: The user flings foam darts at a really fast speed at the target two to five times in a row.
cobblemon.move.toyhammer.desc: The user slams its comically large toy hammer into the target to attack. This also damages the user quite a lot.
cobblemon.move.slimeball.desc: The user hurls a slime blob at the target. This may also lower the target’s Sp. Def stat.
cobblemon.move.protectivelayer.desc: The user puts up a wall of slime infront of it to protect itself from all attacks. Its chance of failing rises if it is used in succession.
cobblemon.move.slimecannon.desc: The user shoots pressurized jet of slime at the target. This may also lower the target’s Speed.
cobblemon.move.gelatinousdoom.desc: The user attempts to catch the target with its dissolving goo. The target faints instantly if this attack hits.
cobblemon.move.slimeyslam.desc: The user drops onto the target with its slimey body. This may also leave the target with paralysis.
cobblemon.move.amoebahammer.desc: Cannot be used twice in a row.
cobblemon.move.slimetrail.desc: The user leaves a slippery trail of slime around the opposing team, which makes them struggle to use contact moves.
cobblemon.move.acidarmorslime.desc: The user alters its cellular structure to liquefy itself, sharply raising its Defense stat.
cobblemon.move.conversiondigital.desc: The user changes its type to become the same type as the move at the top of the list of moves it knows.
cobblemon.move.conversion2digital.desc: The user changes its type to make itself resistant to the type of the attack the target used last.
cobblemon.move.doomscrolling.desc: The user traps the target in a long unskippable internet post for four to five turns.
cobblemon.move.wavedash.desc: The user teaches its allies how to do a technique that ups the Speed stats of the user and its allies for four turns.
cobblemon.move.minmax.desc: The user raises its Attack and Special Attack by 2 stages while decreasing its Defense and Special Defense by two stages.
cobblemon.move.overclock.desc: The user boosts their processing speed. This sharply raises the Speed stat.
cobblemon.move.ddosattack.desc: The user attacks by overloading the target with information packets. This also lowers the target’s Speed stat.
cobblemon.move.networking.desc: The user switches places with a party Pokémon in waiting and passes along any stat changes.
cobblemon.move.clonestamp.desc: The user mimics the move used immediately before it. The move fails if no other move has been used yet.
cobblemon.move.discrot.desc: The user sends a corrupted packet of data that deteriorates the target. This may also lower the target’s Speed stat.
cobblemon.move.disceject.desc: After making its attack, the user rushes back to switch places with a party Pokémon in waiting.
cobblemon.move.empblast.desc: The user attacks everything around it by letting out a wave that disables electronics. The user can’t move on the next turn.
cobblemon.move.meteorblitz.desc: The user cloaks itself in cosmic energy and charges the target. This also damages the user quite a lot. This attack may leave the target with a burn.
cobblemon.move.cosmichorror.desc: The target gazes at the user's true nature. This harshly lowers the target’s Attack stat.
cobblemon.move.suitup.desc: The user puts on a layer of protective space gear to raise its Defense and Sp. Def stats.
cobblemon.move.solarflare.desc: The user shoots a beam of solar energy. The move may use Cosmic-Type or Light-Type. This may also lower the target’s Sp. Def stat.
cobblemon.move.spaghettification.desc: A vicious wave of cosmic energy breaks the fabric of the target. The target faints instantly if this attack hits.
cobblemon.move.asteroidfist.desc: The user throws a punch coated with cosmic energy. This attack never misses.
cobblemon.move.liftoff.desc: The user takes off to space, then strikes the target on the next turn.
cobblemon.move.meteorstrike.desc: The user coats its fist with cosmic energy before striking the target two to five times in a row.
cobblemon.move.starlightshower.desc: The user shoots cosmic energy from their fists at the target two to five times in a row.
cobblemon.move.giantstep.desc: The user drops onto the target a giant boot made out of cosmic energy. This may also leave the target with paralysis.
cobblemon.move.meteorstormpunisher.desc: The user grabs a pebble, imbues it with cosmic energy and throws it at the target. This may also lower the target’s Defense stat.
cobblemon.move.rocketdrillkick.desc: The target is attacked with a drill powered kick. If it misses, the user is hurt instead. This move is Cosmic and Steel type simultaneously.
cobblemon.move.superembomber.desc: In this two-turn attack, the user gathers magnetic energy, then blasts a bundled beam on the next turn. The move may use Electric-Type or Steel-Type.
cobblemon.move.galaxyslash.desc: The user handles a sharp blade, coating it with cosmic energy and attacks by cutting its target. Critical hits land more easily.
cobblemon.move.aerobuster.desc: The user shoots bursts of wind at the target two to five times in a row.
cobblemon.move.stormbomb.desc: A compacted storm is summoned down from the sky onto the target. The attack’s recoil harshly lowers the user’s Sp. Atk stat.
cobblemon.move.spiralheatray.desc: In this two-turn attack, the user gathers nuclear energy, then blasts a bundled beam on the next turn.
cobblemon.move.nuclearpulse.desc: The user attacks opposing Pokémon with countless beams of nuclear energy that glow a deep and brilliant blue. This may also poison the target.
cobblemon.move.beampulser.desc: The user shoots a concentrated beam of fairy energy at its target.
cobblemon.move.cryforpeace.desc: The user attacks opposing Pokémon with countless beams of light that glow in every color of the rainbow.
cobblemon.move.gravitybeam.desc: The user shoots a concentrated beam of cosmic energy at its target.
cobblemon.move.uraniumheatbeam.desc: The target is attacked with an intense blast of all-consuming irradiated fire. This may also leave the target with a burn.
cobblemon.move.hedriumsludge.desc: Unsanitary sludge full of chemicals is hurled at the target. This may also burn the target.
cobblemon.move.hedriumray.desc: The user shoots a concentrated ray of poison at its target. This may also leave the target with a burn.
cobblemon.move.hammerclaw.desc: The target is hammered with a large claw made of a weird space alloy. Critical hits land more easily.
cobblemon.move.bloodytriggers.desc: The user handles attacks by cutting its target with a sharp buzzsaw-like device. Critical hits land more easily.
cobblemon.move.napalmshells.desc: The user forcefully shoots shells full of an explosive material at the target two to five times in a row. This may also leave the target with a burn.
cobblemon.move.universalcutter.desc: The user recovers 1/2 the HP lost by the target, rounded half up. If Big Root is held by the user, the HP recovered is 1.3x normal, rounded half down.
cobblemon.move.giganumecluster.desc: The user attacks with an odd, laser beam that divides itself and explodes near the target. This may also make the target flinch.
cobblemon.move.diamondaxe.desc: The target is struck with an axe-like blade made out of crystals. Critical hits land more easily.
cobblemon.move.diamondsword.desc: The user handles a sharp crystaline blade and attacks by cutting its target. Critical hits land more easily.
cobblemon.move.gemstoneimpact.desc: The user hits the target with a resistant crystalline part of its own body.
cobblemon.move.clustercrash.desc: If the target lost HP, the user takes recoil damage equal to 33% the HP lost by the target, rounded half up, but not less than 1 HP.
cobblemon.move.diamonddrop.desc: The user summons a giant Gemstone and drops it on the target. This may also make the target flinch.
cobblemon.move.jewelshards.desc: The user fires shards of crystal at the target three times in a row.
cobblemon.move.fatalexception.desc: The user attacks everything around it by crashing their own code. The user faints upon using this move.
cobblemon.move.altf4.desc: The user switches places with a party Pokémon in waiting, if any. If a wild Pokémon uses this move, it flees.
cobblemon.move.survivalprotocol.desc: The user accesses their vast databank of procedures, and selects a precisely calculated healing move to sustain them in the current situation, though it is unlikely the same one will be done twice.
cobblemon.move.eldritchblast.desc: The user fires beams of pure dark magic energy towards the target. They hit one to four times in a row.
cobblemon.move.hololaser.desc: The user channels energy to launch as a laser towards the target.
cobblemon.move.banhammer.desc: The target is knocked away, and a different Pokémon is dragged out. In the wild, this ends a battle against a single Pokémon.
cobblemon.move.actionsword.desc: A physical attack in which the user hits the target with a blunt sword-like toy.
cobblemon.move.foamarrows.desc: The user flings long arrow-like pieces of foam at a really fast speed at the target one to three times in a row.
cobblemon.move.foambullets.desc: The user flings small bullet-shaped pieces of foam at a really fast speed at the target five to ten times in a row.
cobblemon.move.otherworldlytentacles.des: A portal is summoned in the target's location, from which tentacles come out to both deal damage and trap the target in the battlefield.
cobblemon.move.lovecraftianmaw.desc: The user opens its terrifying maw to bite the target at full strength.
cobblemon.move.darkwhispers.desc: The user whispers the most terrifying secrets into the target's ear, this move bypasses substitute.
cobblemon.move.devillishfavor.desc: The user calls on a dark mystical favor that raises its Attack and Special Attack stats.
cobblemon.move.prismpunch.desc: The user converts its fist into a prism like object to attack. This move is super effective on Light types.
cobblemon.move.shine.desc: The user attacks with a shine of light. This attack may also lower the target’s accuracy.
cobblemon.move.brightbreak.desc: The user strikes the target's weakspot with light power. This may also lower the target’s Defense stat.
cobblemon.move.glowwhack.desc: The user attacks with a glowing slap. This may also boost the user's evasiveness
cobblemon.move.photonblitz.desc: The user fights recklessly with raw light energy. This also lowers the user’s Defense and Sp. Def stats.
cobblemon.move.shininglaser.desc: The target is hit with a powerful beam of light to inflict damage. This may also lower the target’s Sp. Atk stat.
cobblemon.move.glisteningstrike.desc: The user's body begins to glow brightly before ramming into the target to attack.
cobblemon.move.blindingflash.desc: A massive flash of light is sent to the target and may make it flinch.
cobblemon.move.spaceslam.desc: The user gathers its cosmic energy and attacks the target with it. This move's power is doubled in gravity.
cobblemon.move.eventhorizon.desc: The user creates a blackhole out of cosmic energy and sends it at the target. The target faints instantly if this attack hits. It’s less likely to hit the target if it’s used by Pokémon other than Cosmic types.
cobblemon.move.anvilsmash.desc: The user slams a hammer into the ground, creating a shockwave that hits every pokemon.
cobblemon.move.beamshield.desc: In addition to protecting the user from attacks, this move also damages any attacker that makes direct contact.
cobblemon.move.blueblaster.desc: Releases a stream of blue ice-like flames from its mouth, reducing the target's Speed stat.
cobblemon.move.boombubble.desc: The user unleashes a powerful burst that may make the foe flinch.
cobblemon.move.bugblaster.desc: The user spews out a destructive bullet or glowing data. It may lower the target's Attack stat.
cobblemon.move.cablecrusher.desc: The foe is strangled by the user and held in place 4 to 5 turns. There is no escape.
cobblemon.move.charmingtweety.desc: An earsplitting screech harshly reduces the target's Defense stat.
cobblemon.move.charmingtweetysound.desc: An earsplitting screech harshly reduces the target's Defense stat.
cobblemon.move.compostbomber.desc: Poisonous clumps are scattered aimlessly. It's likely to poison those hit.
cobblemon.move.concertcrush.desc: The user attempts to sing. Those hearing it feel heartbroken and their fighting spirit vanishes.
cobblemon.move.darknetwork.desc: A frenzy of virus infested cables ravage the foe. The user's Sp. Atk harshly drops.
cobblemon.move.darkshot.desc: The user launches a dark organic missile from its spine that always hits the foe.
cobblemon.move.deathnail.desc: The user slashes at its foe with dark matter. This move obliterates any barrier such as Light Screen and Reflect.
cobblemon.move.devilsdeed.desc: The user performs a dark ritual that boosts its Attack and Speed stats.
cobblemon.move.dinokick.desc: The user kicks the opponent, destroying their item. Does less damage if opponent has no item.
cobblemon.move.duoscissorclaw.desc: A scissor-armed attack that can tear through diamond. It may lower the target's Defense.
cobblemon.move.airslam.desc: The user spins towards the foe swinging its Holy Rod. It may leave the target with paralysis.
cobblemon.move.evilwing.desc: The user slashes the opponent with its wing at incredible speed. May leave the target paralyzed.
cobblemon.move.excalibur.desc: The user slashes the enemy using the holy sword, Excalibur. This attack never misses.
cobblemon.move.fincutter.desc: The user cuts the foe with a sharpened fin. This move is more likely to crit.
cobblemon.move.garurukick.desc: After kicking with an ice-covered paw, the user backflips to switch places with a party Pokemon.
cobblemon.move.gigadestroyer.desc: The user unleashes two organic missiles to destroy the foe.
cobblemon.move.heavensknuckle.desc: The user blasts a beam of holy energy from their fist, it does not make contact.
cobblemon.move.hornbuster.desc: Using its thruster, the user charges into the target. Raises the user's Speed stat.
cobblemon.move.hyperstinkshot.desc: The user shoots a bullet, made out of compressed gas. This move is unblockable.
cobblemon.move.iceblast.desc: The target is hit with a sudden blast of freezing energy. This move is strong against Water-Types.
cobblemon.move.iceslash.desc: The target is slashed with a frozen claw or blade. Critical hits land more easily.
cobblemon.move.icewolfclaw.desc: The user launches ice missiles in all directions. It hits two to five times in a row.
cobblemon.move.infinityarrow.desc: Lightning, in the shape of arrows, shoots from the user's fur, leaving the foe paralyzed.
cobblemon.move.lionsword.desc: The user slashes at the target with a magical sword. This attack never misses.
cobblemon.move.mugencannon.desc: The user blasts devastating energy waves from its cannons. It may lower the target's accuracy.
cobblemon.move.nailcrusher.desc: The user crushes the target with its ginormous claws. It may lower the target's defense.
cobblemon.move.necromagic.desc: The user saps HP from teh foe with a cursed grasp, restoring HP equal to half the damage dealt.
cobblemon.move.necromagiceldritch.desc: The user saps HP from teh foe with a cursed grasp, restoring HP equal to half the damage dealt.
cobblemon.move.novablast.desc: The user unleashes a massive pulse of fire to damage the opponent. This may also leave those Pokémon with a burn.
cobblemon.move.omniblast.desc: The user unleashes a bolt of digital energy. Struck foes may get paralyzed burned or frozen.
cobblemon.move.omnihowl.desc: The user hits everything around it with the destructive power of a prideful explosive howl.
cobblemon.move.omnihowlsound.desc: The user hits everything around it with the destructive power of a prideful explosive howl.
cobblemon.move.pagefault.desc: The user sommersaults, striking with its blades for several turns. The user ends up confused.
cobblemon.move.pepperbreath.desc: A small blast of fire that may leave the foe with a burn.
cobblemon.move.poisonbubbles.desc: The user spews bubbles that are covered in a poisonous substance that may poison the foe.
cobblemon.move.sizzleslam.desc: The uer headbutts the opponent with an open flame stove atop its head. Leaves the foe burning.
cobblemon.move.supremecannon.desc: A powerful energy blast from the Garuru Cannon that hits all foes with a chance of freezing.
cobblemon.move.terraforce.desc: The user hurls a scorching ball of energy that strikes every Pokemon around it.
cobblemon.move.virusskater.desc: The user skates through digital data, hitting the foe with a nasty blow. Raises the user's Speed.
cobblemon.move.virusskaterdigital.desc: The user skates through digital data, hitting the foe with a nasty blow. Raises the user's Speed.
cobblemon.move.vulcanshammer.desc: The foe is struck with a spark generating Hammer. It may leave the target with a burn.
cobblemon.move.webwrecker.desc: The user recklessly fires a powerful shot of destructive energy. Hits the entire field.
cobblemon.move.yuckytongue.desc: The target is licked with a long tongue. It may paralyze the foe.
cobblemon.move.trematerra.desc: Thanks to its vibration manipulation, the user can generate a powerful earthquake that acts like a ground/sound type move.
cobblemon.move.turbofalata.desc: The whirlwinds generated by the user are so sharp that they act like a flying/steel type move.
cobblemon.move.toxibolle.desc: The user uses its stored poison to generate poisonous bubbles that act like a water/poison type move.
cobblemon.move.fiatopirotecnico.desc: The user celebrates the New Year with a firework show that acts like an fire/electric type move.
cobblemon.move.bufu.desc: Light Ice damage with Low chance to freeze
cobblemon.move.bufula.desc: Medium Ice damage with Low chance to freeze
cobblemon.move.bufudyne.desc: Heavy Ice damage with Medium chance to freeze
cobblemon.move.niflheim.desc: Severe Ice damage with High chance to freeze
cobblemon.move.mindcharge.desc: Next Special attack deals double the damage.
cobblemon.move.hystericalslap.desc: Light Physical damage with Low chance to confuse
cobblemon.battle.activate.magmaring: %1$s became trapped in the fiery vortex!
cobblemon.battle.weather.battleaura.star: The area fills up with aura!
cobblemon.battle.weather.battleaura.end: The aura fades from the area.
cobblemon.battle.weather.cursedwinds.sta: A rift to another world was opened!
cobblemon.battle.weather.dragonforce.sta: A draconic force envelops the battlefield!
cobblemon.battle.weather.fallout.start: A toxic fallout has set in!
cobblemon.battle.weather.magnetosphere.e: The magnetic field returns to normal.
cobblemon.battle.sidestart.constructionb: Plastic bricks are scattered around %1$s team!
cobblemon.battle.sidestart.fiesta: Candy was scattered on the ground all around %1$s team!
cobblemon.battle.sideend.constructionblo: The plastic bricks disappeared from around %1$s team!
cobblemon.battle.sideend.fiesta: The candy disappeared from around %1$s team!
cobblemon.battle.sideend.brace: %1$s is no longer bracing for impact!
cobblemon.battle.damage.acidrain: %1$s was melted by the acid rain.
cobblemon.battle.damage.fallout: %1$s was irradiated by the toxic fallout.
cobblemon.battle.damage.parasiticfungi: %1$s was damanged by the parasitic fungi!
cobblemon.ability.orbitaltide.desc: Gravity is intensified while on the field.
cobblemon.ability.perforate.desc: Moves of the same type as the Pokémon ignore immunities.
cobblemon.ability.permafrost.desc: Boosts the Pokémon's Defense in a hailstorm.
cobblemon.ability.pollution.desc: The Pokémon summons acid rain in battle.
cobblemon.ability.psychout.desc: Lowers the foe's Special Attack stat.
cobblemon.ability.scavenger.desc: Regains HP after knocking out any Pokémon.
cobblemon.ability.sunbathe.desc: The Pokémon gradually regains HP in sunlight.
cobblemon.ability.terrorize.desc: Normal-type moves become Ghost-type moves. The power of those moves is boosted a little.
cobblemon.ability.digitize.desc: Normal-type moves become Digital-type moves. The power of those moves is boosted a little.
cobblemon.ability.fossilize.desc: Normal-type moves become Rock-type moves. The power of those moves is boosted a little.
cobblemon.ability.allure.desc: Lowers the evasiveness of foes of the opposite gender.
cobblemon.ability.conundrum.desc: Contact with the Pokémon may confuse the attacker.
cobblemon.ability.feedback.desc: Inflicts damage to Pokémon when attacked with non-contact moves.
cobblemon.ability.highnoon.desc: Makes most moves lose their priority.
cobblemon.ability.absolution.desc: Boosts the Sp. Atk stat when the New Moon is active, but HP decreases every turn.
cobblemon.ability.amplifier.desc: This Pokemon's sound-based moves have their power multiplied by 1.25.
cobblemon.ability.athenian.desc: Doubles the Pokémon’s Special Attack stat.
cobblemon.ability.castlemoat.desc: Boosts the Special Defense stat if hit by a Water-type move instead of taking damage.
cobblemon.ability.eventhorizon.desc: Any Pokémon that contacts this one can't escape.
cobblemon.ability.foundry.desc: Rock-type moves become Fire-type moves. The power of those moves is boosted a little.
cobblemon.ability.heliophobia.desc: Restores HP in the Darkness. Reduces HP in harsh sunlight, and increases the damage received from Light-type moves.
cobblemon.ability.hubris.desc: The Pokémon shows hubris, and that boosts the Special Attack stat after knocking out any Pokémon.
cobblemon.ability.intoxicate.desc: Normal-type moves become Poison-type moves. The power of those moves is boosted a little.
cobblemon.ability.noctem.desc: The user summons darkness and blots out the sky as it enters the battle.
cobblemon.ability.phototroph.desc: The user gradually regains HP in sunny weather.
cobblemon.ability.psychocall.desc: Powers up Psychic-type moves in a pinch.
cobblemon.ability.shadowcall.desc: Powers up Dark-type moves in a pinch.
cobblemon.ability.shadowdance.desc: Boosts the Pokémon’s Speed stat when the New Moon is active.
cobblemon.ability.speedswap.desc: Activates the Trick Room effect on entering the battlefield.
cobblemon.ability.spiritcall.desc: Powers up Ghost-type moves in a pinch.
cobblemon.ability.windforce.desc: Boosts the Speed stat if hit by a Flying-type or Wind-type move instead of taking damage.
cobblemon.ability.acceleration.desc: This Pokemon's speed based moves have their power multiplied by 1.5.
cobblemon.ability.atomizate.desc: Normal-type moves become Nuclear-type moves. The power of those moves is boosted a little.
cobblemon.ability.chernobyl.desc: The Pokémon summons a nuclear fallout when it enters battle.
cobblemon.ability.deepfreeze.desc: Contact with the Pokémon may freeze the attacker.
cobblemon.ability.disenchant.desc: Gives full immunity to all fairy type moves.
cobblemon.ability.leadskin.desc: Gives full immunity to all nuclear type moves.
cobblemon.ability.petrify.desc: The Pokémon petrifies opposing Pokémon upon entering battle, lowering their Speed stat.
cobblemon.ability.sharpcoral.desc: Halves defenses but doubles attack power.
cobblemon.ability.soundboost.desc: This Pokemon's sound-based moves have their power multiplied by 1.3.
cobblemon.ability.coldwave.desc: Contact with the Pokémon may freeze the attacker.
cobblemon.ability.deepsleep.desc: Restores HP if the Pokémon is asleep.
cobblemon.ability.explode.desc: The Pokémon explodes upon fainting, inflicting damage on those nearby.
cobblemon.ability.frighten.desc: The Pokémon frightens opposing Pokémon upon entering battle, lowering their Speed stat.
cobblemon.ability.blackhole.desc: Prevents Psychic-type and Cosmic-type Pokémon from escaping using its gravitational force.
cobblemon.ability.sprint.desc: Boosts the Speed stat when hit by an attack.
cobblemon.ability.tenacity.desc: May flinch a target when the Pokémon makes contact.
